page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
Five schools have liased to produce this entry.They are,Beardall Street PS,Broomhill Jun, Butlers Hill Inf, Edgewood PS and Spring Street PS.We record our thanks to the Headteachers of these schools and the nominated members of staff. The project, although time-consuming, has proved very worthwhile and enjoyable for all concerned. Many children from each school have contributed to this project,in particular we would mention Gavin Paylor(Butlers Hill) and Nicola Tantum(Beardall Street). Thanks also to Mr P Dawson,the colliery winder, for his contribution.
{The final disc was prepared by :- {Mr. Steve Abbott(Beardall Street {). Mr. Andrew Edis(Broomhill). {
